alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties after 630pm CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Saxon to near Mellen to 9 miles south of Clam Lake to near Couderay to Shell Lake. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winchester around 635 PM CDT. Rice Creek Natural Area around 645 PM CDT. Boulder Junction around 650 PM CDT. Squirrel Lake, Willow Lake and Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area around 655 PM CDT. Willow Reservoir around 700 PM CDT. Eagle River around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mc Naughton, Sayner, Land O Lakes, Nixon Lake Natural Area, Lac Vieux Desert, Hazelhurst, Upper Buckatabon Springs Natural Area, Woodruff, St Germain and Tomahawk River Pines Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
